personal.name: Abdulmajid Mraied
personal.bio: I operate at the intersection of the physical and digital worlds. With a foundation in Computer Engineering, I design the hardware and circuitry that powers modern computing. My expertise extends through the Software Engineering stack, allowing me to build robust infrastructures that support my primary focus: Artificial Intelligence. I don't just write code; I build the brains and the bodies that allow intelligence to scale and interact with the real world through robotics and optimized architecture.

hero.title: Turning ideas into
hero.description: I engineer intelligent systems by bridging the gap between hardware architecture, software infrastructure, and artificial intelligence.

education.description: Focusing on hardware-software integration, AI, and system architecture.

builds.title: Saraya Eats
builds.description: A high-performance e-commerce platform for Saraya Hamra University. Features student authentication, real-time quantity management, and a categorized digital menu designed with institutional branding.

builds.title: AI Extract
builds.description: A web application developed during a hackathon, aimed at assisting blind students with their studies. It uses OCR technology to extract data from PDF files, allowing information to be saved for future study. It also features voice-controlled commands for enhanced accessibility.

builds.title: Student e-ID
builds.description: A digital ID for students that centralizes access to information and documents. This opens possibilities for new features such as secure building entrances, parking management, and more robust campus security systems.
